title: Forum Question
body:
What are these levels that you need to post a comment or discussion in other sections
and
how do you level ?

Thanks :-)

replies.body: Your boards level is actually tied directly to your Summoner level on the game client!  Now that you're level 15, you should be able to comment anywhere you need.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gZIHfEN8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-11T00:46:30.744+0000)
>
> Your boards level is actually tied directly to your Summoner level on the game client!  Now that you're level 15, you should be able to comment anywhere you need.

ok thnkz it was taking a while though to update past lvl 4 even when I was higher then lvl 4 couldnt post it  lvl 6 or 7 forums for eample even though I was higher then those levels in game
